conditions.message: ORCID must be in the format 'XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX' where X is a digit or 'X'. For example: 0000-0002-1825-0097
VIAF ID must be a string of 2 to 22 digits, not starting with 0. For example: 12345678
Crossref ID must be a string of one or more digits. For example: 98765432
Wikidata ID must start with 'Q' followed by a non-zero digit and optionally more digits. For example: Q42
Wikipedia ID must be a string of digits not starting with 0. For example: 123456
ROR ID must be in the format '0XXXXXXXX' where X is a digit or lowercase letter (excluding i, l, o), optionally prefixed with 'https://ror.org/'. For example: 04wxnsj81 or https://ror.org/04wxnsj81

Wikidata ID must start with 'Q' followed by a non-zero digit and optionally more digits. For example: Q42
Wikipedia ID must be a string of digits not starting with 0. For example: 123456
ROR ID must be in the format '0XXXXXXXX' where X is a digit or lowercase letter (excluding i, l, o), optionally prefixed with 'https://ror.org/'. For example: 04wxnsj81 or https://ror.org/04wxnsj81
ORCID must be in the format 'XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX' where X is a digit or 'X'. For example: 0000-0002-1825-0097
